snippet: After selling their mobile app to Facebook for $1 billion, Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger celebrated their new wealth at Wynn and Encore Las Vegas on Friday night, The New York Post reported. Jesse Waits, a managing partner at Encore's XS nightclub,...
abstract: After selling their mobile app to Facebook for $1 billion, Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger celebrated their new wealth at Wynn and Encore Las Vegas on Friday night, The New York Post reported. Jesse Waits, a managing partner at Encore's XS nightclub, posted a photo on Instgram of the 26-year-olds with the D.J.'s Deadmau5 and Avicii.

headline.main: Instagram Founders Celebrate New Millions in Vegas
